thread.section_title: Constant Contact Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Constant Contact | www.constantcontact.com
thread.title: Jamie Vogt`
thread.title_full: Constant Contact reviewed by Jamie Vogt`

author: Jamie Vogt`
title: Jamie Vogt`
text:
Constant Contact has been a fabulous resource for us this past year.
We have enjoyed the easy set-up of emails that we send out weekly.
Being able to create and share our brand with our members using such a creative platform has been wonderful.
I would highly recommend Constant Contact to any business that is looking for a way to share their message.
Thank You and we look forward to the year ahead :)
